abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Additional
            Financing for the Health Project for Serbia is to build
            capacity to develop a sustainable, performance oriented
            health care system where providers are rewarded for quality
            and efficiency and where health insurance coverage ensures
            access to affordable and effective care. The extension of
            the closing date is necessary to: (i) allow successful
            updating of the Health Information System (HIS) software
            originally installed in the four participating hospitals,
            and (ii) full implementation of the HIS in 20 hospitals.
            Good progress is being made in both activities with key
            implementation milestones well advanced: (i) customization
            of software has been finished in all hospitals, (ii)
            training has been completed in all hospitals and primary
            health care (PHC centers), and (iii) hardware has been
            installed in all the facilities. However, to ensure that
            acceptance procedures are carried out systematically, it is
            prudent to allow additional time to avoid the risk that some
            unexpected issues could slow down the process. This will be
            the first and final extension of the loan closing date.
